Title: Using Puppet to manage Google Compute Engine resources
Description:
This screencast demonstrates how you can use Puppet and Google Compute Engine. It uses the Puppetlabs 'gce_compute' module [https://forge.puppetlabs.com/puppetlabs/gce_compute] to create 4 virtual machines, a Compute Engine Load-balancer, and open up a firewall rule for HTTP traffic.

Everything you need to repeat this demo on your own can be found at, https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/compute-video-demo-puppet
